titleStmt.title: The Scots vindication of some former transactions. And declaration of their unanimous consent, and resolutions to assist His Majesty, Charls the II. VVith the utmost of their lives and estates, for the advancement of his affaires, towards the recovery of his right in England, and bringing of the murtherers of his father to justice. And a letter from the chancellour of Scotland his secretary, to a worthy friend of his in England. Imprimatur.

The Scots vindication of some former transactions. And declaration of their unanimous consent, and resolutions to assist His Majesty, Charls the II. VVith the utmost of their lives and estates, for the advancement of his affaires, towards the recovery of his right in England, and bringing of the murtherers of his father to justice. And a letter from the chancellour of Scotland his secretary, to a worthy friend of his in England. Imprimatur.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
